content.body: in reviewing MDN patches, I‚Äôve run into cases where MDN article need to describe what happens with calling methods from `Date` objects that aren‚Äôt really dates

content.body: but I‚Äôm wondering if there‚Äôs some better way to describe it ‚Äî I mean, without resorting to talking about internal slots of the object
